title: JACQUARD KAFTAN WITH FRINGING
desc: Long silk- and cotton-blend jacquard kaftan with decorative, placed foliage motif. Boasting an elastic insert with drawstring at the waist,, this model features long macramé-effect fringes at the edges.• Oversized fit• V-neck• Wide sleeves• Elastic insert with drawstring• Side splits• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
